1345:2: na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate|
1345:3: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam||1||
1345:4: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā|
1345:5: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ||2||
1345:6: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātramāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām|
1345:7: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ||3||
1345:10: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha|
1345:11: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām||5||
1345:12: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ|
1345:14: arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre|
